author: juergen
msg: accept a created response code in case of locking a null resource. Reported by wolfgang.theilmann@sap.com, thanks.

author: juergen
msg: use a buffered input stream for performance reasons. Reported by wolfgang.theilmann@sap.com, thanks.

author: juergen
msg: 1) the console protocol prints now the current date
2) the var logging is switched off by default and can be enabled by -Dxdav.tracingRequest=var
3) slide client logging can be switched on by -Dxdav.tracingRequest=client

author: pnever
msg: Enabled the Servlet init parameter "allpropIncludesComputed"; if the value
is true, computed properties are included in an "allprop" request.
